00041 /*_____ I N C L U D E S ____________________________________________________*/
00042 
00043 #include "config.h"
00044 #include "lib_mcu/usb/usb_drv.h"
00045 #include "usb_descriptors.h"
00046 
00047 #include "uart_usb_lib.h"
00048 
00049 /*_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________*/
00050 
00051 /*_____ D E F I N I T I O N ________________________________________________*/
00052 
00053 
00054 Uchar rx_counter;
00055 
00056 /*_____ D E C L A R A T I O N ______________________________________________*/
00057 
00061 void uart_usb_init(void)
00062 {
00063   rx_counter = 0;
00064 }
00065 
00071 bit uart_usb_test_hit(void)
00072 {
00073   if (!rx_counter)
00074   {
00075     Usb_select_endpoint(RX_EP);
00076     if (Is_usb_receive_out())
00077     {
00078       rx_counter = Usb_byte_counter();
00079       if (!rx_counter)
00080       {
00081         Usb_ack_receive_out();
00082       }
00083     }
00084   }
00085   return (rx_counter!=0);
00086 }
00087 
00096 char uart_usb_getchar(void)
00097 {
00098   register Uchar data_rx;
00099 
00100   Usb_select_endpoint(RX_EP);
00101   if (!rx_counter) while (!uart_usb_test_hit());
00102   data_rx=Usb_read_byte();
00103   rx_counter--;
00104   if (!rx_counter) Usb_ack_receive_out();
00105   return data_rx;
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00115 bit uart_usb_tx_ready(void)
00116 {
00117   if (!Is_usb_write_enabled())
00118   {
00119     return FALSE;
00120   }
00121   return TRUE;
00122 }
00123 
00133 int uart_usb_putchar(int data_to_send)
00134 {
00135    uart_usb_send_buffer((U8*)&data_to_send, 1);
00136    return data_to_send;
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 
00148 void uart_usb_send_buffer(U8 *buffer, U8 nb_data)
00149 {
00150    U8 zlp;
00151    
00152    // Compute if zlp required
00153    if(nb_data%TX_EP_SIZE) 
00154    { zlp=FALSE;} 
00155    else { zlp=TRUE; }
00156    
00157    Usb_select_endpoint(TX_EP);
00158    while (nb_data)
00159    {
00160       while(Is_usb_write_enabled()==FALSE); // Wait Endpoint ready
00161       while(Is_usb_write_enabled() && nb_data)
00162       {
00163          Usb_write_byte(*buffer);
00164          buffer++;
00165          nb_data--;
00166    }
00167       Usb_ack_in_ready();
00168    }
00169    if(zlp)
00170    {
00171       while(Is_usb_write_enabled()==FALSE); // Wait Endpoint ready 
00172       Usb_ack_in_ready();
00173 }
00174 }
